Node.definition: = state in which a countable entity is two in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= month, equivalent to period February/March; ► post exilic
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to reach; hence: = process by which a certain event reaches the time for it to take place
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans look forward with confidence for something to happen
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which events take on a different nature
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action

Node.gloss: to lay (one's) hands (on someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (against someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities engage in an act of violence against (other) humans
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
literally: to fall (upon someone); hence: = process by which humans are affected by a certain condition, emotion, or supernatural influence
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= person in charge of part of the Persian empire

Node.definition: literally: to hold, carry; hence: = action by which humans provide help and support to other humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom

= process by which events continue over a prolonged period of time, ◄ described as movement along time

= the killing of people in a cruel and violent way
= process of removing people from existence; ◄ by means of aggression and violence

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man; ◄ son of Jair (יָאִיר) cousin of Esther (אֶסְתֵּר); tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► adopted Esther (אֶסְתֵּר) after the death of her parents and later succeeded Haman (הָמָן) as vizier under Xerxes (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= causative action by which humans send a message, (supposedly) in the form of a written document to someone else
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= causative action by which deities or humans in a position of authority establish a certain condition or pattern of events

= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= man; ◄ son of Jair (יָאִיר) cousin of Esther (אֶסְתֵּר); tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► adopted Esther (אֶסְתֵּר) after the death of her parents and later succeeded Haman (הָמָן) as vizier under Xerxes (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ)
= man; ◄ son of Hammedatha (הַמְּדָתָא) descendant of Agag (אֲגַג) ► he tried to exterminate all Jews in the kingdom of Persia (פָּרַס)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Haman (הָמָן) who tried to exterminate all Jews in the kingdom of Persia (פָּרַס)
= descendant of Agag (אֲגָגִי)
= person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
literally: to let lots fall; hence: = causative action by which humans throw lots in order to select individuals or groups from among a large group
= specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot
= causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to be removed from existence, usually in a violent way

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage

Node.gloss: to be repaid|to be paid back|to be punished
Node.definition: literally: to come back on (someone's) head; hence: = process by which humans receive the appropriate return for their actions, which are mostly evil
= procedure for achieving a certain purpose, originating from someone's לֵב mind
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= a wooden construction used to execute criminals by hanging
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= yearly feast to celebrate how Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) was delivered from the evil plans of Haman (הָמָן) who cast the lot to determine the day when they were to be exterminated
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions
= written document; ► composed by government official and used to communicate instructions or information to other people

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
literally: to reach; hence: = process by which a certain event reaches the time for it to take place
= action by which humans accept an event with willingness and/or patience
